SYSTEM_MSG_1.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: there are [0-9]+ clusters'

SYSTEM_MSG_2.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: ([A-Za-z ]+,\s*)*[A-Za-z ]+'

nClusters.content: Imagine a class of 15 students. Vivian, Salma, Shanshan, Vadim, and Gongxue are all connected to each other. Paul, Solomon, Soheil, Gongxue, and Alice are connected to each other. Pierre, Abdul, Durga, Ajit, and Soheil are all connected to each other. Noah, Salma, Shanshan, Vadim, and Anisha are connected to each other. Solomon, Soheil, Gongxue, and Alice are connected to each other. Abdul, Durga, Ajit, and Anisha are connected to each other. Salma, Shanshan, and Vadim are connected to each other. Soheil is connected to Alice. Durga, Ajit and Anisha are connected to each other. Shanshan is connected to Vadim. Gongxue is connected to Alice. Ajit is connected to Anisha. How many densely-connected clusters do we have in this class? A densely-connected cluster is a group of students that are connected to themselves with a max of 2 students.

nClustersFloors.content: Imagine a class of 15 students. The class is divided into several levels. On the first level, Vivian, Salma, Shanshan, and Vadim are all connected to each other. Noah, Salma, Shanshan, and Vadim are connected to each other. Salma, Shanshan, and Vadim are connected to each other. Shanshan is connected to Vadim.  On the second level, Paul, Solomon, Soheil, Gongxue, and Alice are connected to each other. Solomon, Soheil, Gongxue, and Alice are connected to each other. Soheil is connected to Alice. Gongxue is connected to Alice.  On the third level, Pierre, Abdul, Durga, and Ajit are all connected to each other. Abdul, Durga, Ajit, and Anisha are connected to each other. Durga, Ajit and Anisha are connected to each other. Ajit is connected to Anisha.  Vivian on the first level is connected to Gongxue on the second level on a social network app. Soheil on the second level is connected to Pierre on the third level on another app. Anisha on the third level is connected to Noah on the first level on a different app.  How many densely-connecte clusters do we have in this class? A densely-connected cluster is a group of students that are connected to themselves with a max of 2 students.
